GV05agsas_2u:6: tatropapattyāpi dvaitasya vaitathyaṃ śakyate 'vadhārayitum iti dvitīyaṃ prakaraṇam ārabhyate
GV05agsas_2u:8: antaḥsthānāt tu bhāvānāṃ saṃvṛtatvena hetunā // MandUpK_2.1 //
GV05agsas_2u:11: kasya? sarveṣāṃ bāhyādhyātmikānāṃ bhāvānāṃ padārthānāṃ svapna upalabhyamānānām,
GV05agsas_2u:16: tatra hi bhāvopalabhyante parvatahastyādayo na bahiḥ śarīrāt /
GV05agsas_2u:18: nanvapavarakādyantarupalabhyamānair ghaṭādibhiranaikāntiko hetur ityāśaṅkyāha saṃvṛtatvena hetuna iti /
GV05agsas_2u:20: na hy antaḥ saṃvṛte dehento nāḍīṣu parvatahastyādīnāṃ saṃbhavo 'sti,
GV05agsas_2u:24: yasmāt prācyeṣu supta udakṣu svapnān paśyann iva dṛśyata ityetad āśaṅkyāha
GV05agsas_2u:25: adīrghatvāc ca kālasya gatvā deśān na paśyati /
GV05agsas_2u:26: pratibuddhaś ca vai sarvas tasmin deśe na vidyate // MandUpK_2.2 //
GV05agsas_2u:28: yasmāt suptamātra eva dehadeśād yojanaśatāntarite māsamātraprāpye deśe svapnān paśyann iva dṛśyate /
GV05agsas_2u:29: na ca tad deśaprāpter āgamanasya dīrghaḥ kālo 'sti /
GV05agsas_2u:30: ato dārghatvāc ca kālasya na svapnadṛgdeśāntaraṃ gacchati /
GV05agsas_2u:31: kiṃ ca pratibuddhaś ca vai sarvaḥ svapnadṛksvapnadarśanadeśe na vidyate /
GV05agsas_2u:32: yadi ca svapne deśāntaraṃ gacched yasmin deśe svapnān paśyet tatraiva pratibudhyeta /
GV05agsas_2u:38: gṛhītaścetvām adya tatropalabdhavanto vayam iti vayamiti brūyuḥ /
GV05agsas_2u:39: na caitad asti tasmān na deśāntaraṃ gacchati svapne //2//
GV05agsas_2u:41: itaś ca svapnadṛśyā bhāvā vitathā yataḥ
GV05agsas_2u:43: vaitathyaṃ tena vai prāptaṃ svapna āhuḥ prakāśitam // MandUpK_2.3 //
GV05agsas_2u:44: abhāvaś caiva rathādīnāṃ svapnadṛśyānāṃ śrūyate nyāyapūrvakaṃ yuktitaḥ śrutau“na tatra rathāḥ“(bṛ.u.4 / 3 / 10) ity atra /
GV05agsas_2u:45: dehāntaḥ sthānasaṃvṛtatvādihetunā prāptaṃ vaikathyaṃ tad anuvādinyā śrutyā svapne svayañjyotiṣṭvapratipādanaparayā prakāśitamāhur brahmavidaḥ
GV05agsas_2u:47: antasthānāt tu bhedānāṃ tasmāj jāgarite smṛtam /
GV05agsas_2u:48: yathā tatra tathā svapne saṃvṛtatvena bhidyate // MandUpK_2.4 //
GV05agsas_2u:49: jāgrad dṛśyānāṃ bhāvānāṃ vaitathyam iti pratijñā /
GV05agsas_2u:50: dṛśyatvād iti hetuḥ svapnadṛśyabhāvavad iti dṛṣṭāntaḥ /
GV05agsas_2u:51: yathā tatra svapne dṛśyānāṃ bhāvānāṃ vaitathyaṃ tathā jāgarite 'pi dṛśyatvam aviśiṣṭam iti hetūpanayaḥ /
GV05agsas_2u:52: tasmāj jāgarite 'pi vaitathyaṃ smṛtam iti nigamanam /
GV05agsas_2u:53: antaḥsthānāt saṃvṛtatvena ca svapnadṛśyānāṃ bhāvānāṃ jāgrad dṛśyebhyaḥ bhedaḥ /
GV05agsas_2u:57: bhedānāṃ hi samatvena prasiddhenaiva hetunā // MandUpK_2.5 //
GV05agsas_2u:58: prasiddhenaiva bhedānāṃ grāhyagrāhakatvena hetunā samatvena svapnajāgaritasthānayor ekatvamāhurvivekina iti pūrvapramāṇasiddhasyaiva phalam
GV05agsas_2u:60: itaś ca vaitathyaṃ jāgrad dṛśyānāṃ bhedānām ādyantayor abhāvāt /
GV05agsas_2u:61: ādāvante ca yan nāsti vartamāne 'pi tat tathā /
GV05agsas_2u:62: vitathaiḥ sadṛśāḥ santo 'vitathā iva lakṣitāḥ // MandUpK_2.6 //
GV05agsas_2u:63: yadādāv ante ca nāsti vastu mṛgatṛṣṇikādi tanmadhye 'pi nāsty ati niścitaṃ loke tatheme jāgrad dṛśyā bhedāḥ /
GV05agsas_2u:64: ādyantayor abhāvād vitathair eva mṛgatṛṣṇikādibhiḥ sadṛśatvād vitathā eva tathāpi vitathā iva lakṣitā mūḍhair anātmavidbhiḥ //6//
GV05agsas_2u:66: svapnadṛśyavajjāgaritadṛśyānām api satvam iti yad uktaṃ tad ayuktam /
GV05agsas_2u:67: yasmāj jāgrad dṛśyā annapānavāhanādayaḥ kṣutpipāsādinivṛttiṃ kurvanto gamanāgamanādikāryaṃ ca saprayojānā dṛṣṭāḥ /
GV05agsas_2u:69: tasmāt svapnadṛśyavad jāgrad dṛśyānām asatvaṃ manorathamātram iti /
GV05agsas_2u:73: tasmād ādyantavatvena mithyaiva khalu te smṛtāḥ // MandUpK_2.7 //
GV05agsas_2u:74: saprayojanatā dṛṣṭā yā annapānādīnāṃ sā svapne vipratipadyate /
GV05agsas_2u:75: jāgarite hi bhuktvā pītvā ca tṛpto vinivartitatṛṭsuptamātra eva kṣutpipāsādyārtam ahorātroṣitaṃ bhuktavantam ātmānaṃ manyate /
GV05agsas_2u:76: yathā spapne bhuktvā pītvā ca tṛpta utthitas tathā /
GV05agsas_2u:77: tasmād jāgrad dṛśyānāṃ svapne vipratipattir dṛṣṭā /
GV05agsas_2u:78: ato manyāmahe teṣām apy asatvaṃ spapnadṛśyavadanāśaṅkanīyam iti /
GV05agsas_2u:79: tasmād ādyantavatvamubhayatra samānam iti mithyā iva khalu te smṛtāḥ //7//
GV05agsas_2u:81: svapnajāgradbhedayoḥ samatvāj jāgradbhedānām asatvam iti yad uktaṃ tadasat /
GV05agsas_2u:85: na hi jāgrad dṛṣṭā evaite bhedāḥ svapne dṛśyante /
GV05agsas_2u:89: anyad apy evaṃprakāram apūrvaṃ paśyati svapne /
GV05agsas_2u:90: tan nānyenā asatā samam iti sadeva /
GV05agsas_2u:93: tan na, svapne dṛṣṭam apūrvaṃ yan manyase na tatsvataḥ siddham /
GV05agsas_2u:96: tānayaṃ prekṣate gatvā yathaiveha suśikṣitaḥ // MandUpK_2.8 //
GV05agsas_2u:97: apūrvaṃ sthānidharmo hi sthānino draṣṭur eva hi svapnasthānavato dharmaḥ /
GV05agsas_2u:98: yathā svarganivāsināmindrādīnāṃ sahasrākṣatvādi tathā svapnadṛśo 'pūrvo 'yaṃ dharmaḥ /
GV05agsas_2u:101: yathaiveha loke suśikṣito deśāntaramārgastane mārgeṇa deśāntaraṃ gatvā tānpadārthānpaśyati tadvat /
GV05agsas_2u:102: tasmādyathā sthānidharmāṇāṃ rajjusarpamṛgatṛṣṇikādīnāmasatvaṃ tathā svapnadṛṣyānāmapūrvāṇāṃ sthānidharmatvamevetyasattvamato na svapnadṛṣṭāntasyāsiddhatvam
GV05agsas_2u:104: apūrvatvāśaṅkā nirākṛtā svapnadṛṣṭāntasya punaḥ svapnatulyatāṃ jāgradbhedānāṃ prapañcayannāha
GV05agsas_2u:105: svapnavṛttāv api tv antaś cetasā kalpitaṃ tv asat /
GV05agsas_2u:106: bahiś cetogṛhītaṃ sad dṛṣṭaṃ vaitathyam etayoḥ // MandUpK_2.9 //
GV05agsas_2u:107: svapnavṛttāv api svapnasthāne 'py antaś cetasā manorathasaṅkalpitam asat /
GV05agsas_2u:108: saṅkalpānantarasamakālam evādarśanāt tatraiva svapne bahiś cetasā gṛhītaṃ cakṣurādidvāreṇopalabdhaṃ ghaṭādi sat /
GV05agsas_2u:109: ity eva satyam iti niścite 'pi sadasadvibhāgo dṛṣṭaḥ /
GV05agsas_2u:112: jāgradvṛttāvapi tv antaś cetasā kalpitaṃ tv asat /
GV05agsas_2u:113: bahiścetogṛhītaṃ sad yuktaṃ vaitathyam etayoḥ // MandUpK_2.10 //
GV05agsas_2u:118: ubhayor api vaitathyaṃ bhedānāṃ sthānayor yadi /
GV05agsas_2u:119: ka etān budhyate bhedān ko vai teṣāṃ vikalpakaḥ // MandUpK_2.11 //
GV05agsas_2u:126: sa eva budhyate bhedān iti vedāntaniścayaḥ // MandUpK_2.12 //
GV05agsas_2u:127: svayaṃ svamāyayā svamātmānamātsā deva ātmanyeva vakṣyamāṇaṃ bhedākāraṃ kalpayati rajjvādāviva sarpādīn svayameva ta tānbudhyate bhedāṃstadvadevetyevaṃ vedāntaniścayaḥ /
GV05agsas_2u:128: nānyo 'sti jñānasmṛtyāśrayo na ca nirāspada eva jñānasmṛtī vaināśikānāmivetyabhiprāyaḥ //12//
GV05agsas_2u:132: niyatāṃś ca bahiścitta evaṃ kalpayate prabhuḥ // MandUpK_2.13 //
GV05agsas_2u:133: vikaroti nānā karotyaparāṃl laukikān bhāvān padārthāñ śabdādīnanyāṃścāntaścitte vāsanārūpeṇa
GV05agsas_2u:140: cittakālā hi ye 'ntas tu dvayakālāś ca ye bahiḥ /
GV05agsas_2u:141: kalpitā eva te sarve viśeṣo nānyahetukaḥ // MandUpK_2.14 //
GV05agsas_2u:143: nānyaścittakālavyatirekeṇa paricchedakaḥ kālo yeṣāṃ te cittakālāḥ /
GV05agsas_2u:147: yāvadāste tāvadgāṃ dogdhi yāvadgāṃ dogdhi tāvadāste /
GV05agsas_2u:148: tāvānayametāvānsa iti parasparaparicchedyaparicchedakatvaṃ bāhyānāṃ bhedānāṃ te dvayakalā antaścittakālā bāhyāśca dvayakālāḥ kalpitā eva te sarve /
GV05agsas_2u:152: avyaktā eva ye 'ntas tu sphuṭā eva ca ye bahiḥ /
GV05agsas_2u:153: kalpitā eva te sarve viśeṣas tv indriyāntare // MandUpK_2.15 //
GV05agsas_2u:154: yadapyantaravyaktatvaṃ bhāvānāṃ manovāsanāmātrābhivyaktānāṃ sphuṭatvaṃ vā bahiścakṣurādīndriyāntare viśeṣo nāsau bhedānāmastitvakṛtaḥ svapne 'pi tathā darśanāt /
GV05agsas_2u:156: ataḥ kalpitā eva jāgtadbhāvā api svapnabhāvavaditi siddham //15//
GV05agsas_2u:159: jīvaṃ kalpayate pūrvaṃ vaco bhāvān pṛthagvidhān /
GV05agsas_2u:160: bāhyān ādhyātmikāṃś caiva yathāvidyas tathāsmṛtiḥ // MandUpK_2.16 //
GV05agsas_2u:162: ahaṃ karomi mama sukhaduḥkhe ityevaṃ lakṣaṇam,
GV05agsas_2u:163: anevaṃlakṣaṇa eva śuddha ātmani rajjāviva sarpaṃ kalpayate pūrvam /
GV05agsas_2u:172: tatra jīvakalpanā sarvakalpanāmūlamityuktaṃ saiva jīvakalpanā kiṃnimitteti dṛṣṭāntena pratipādayati
GV05agsas_2u:174: sarpadhārādibhir bhāvais tadvad ātmā vikalpitaḥ // MandUpK_2.17 //
GV05agsas_2u:175: yathā loke svena rūpeṇāniścitānavadhāritaivameveti rajjurmandāndhakāre kiṃ sarpa
GV05agsas_2u:176: udakadhārā daṇḍa iti vānekadhā vikalpitā bhavati pūrvaṃ svarūpāniścayanimittaṃ yadi
GV05agsas_2u:177: hi pūrvameva rajjuḥ svarūpeṇa niścitā syāt,
GV05agsas_2u:184: rajjur eveti cādvaitaṃ tadvad ātmaviniścayaḥ // MandUpK_2.18 //
GV05agsas_2u:185: rajjureveti niścaye sarvavikalpanivṛttau rajjureveti cādvaitaṃ yathā tathā 'neti neti'(bṛ.u.4.4.22)
GV05agsas_2u:192: yadyātmaika eveti niścayaḥ kathaṃ prāṇādibhiranantairbhāvairetaiḥ saṃsāralakṣaṇairvikalpita ity ucyate, śṛṇu
GV05agsas_2u:193: prāṇādibhir anantaiś ca bhāvair etair vikalpitaḥ /
GV05agsas_2u:194: māyaiṣā tasya devasya yayā saṃmohitaḥ svayam // MandUpK_2.19 //
GV05agsas_2u:196: yathā māyāvinā vihitā māyā gaganamativimalaṃ kusumitaiḥ sapalāśaistarubhirākīrṇamiva karoti tatheyamapi devasya māyā yayāyaṃ svayamapi mohita iva mohito bhavati /
GV05agsas_2u:199: prāṇa iti prāṇavido bhūtānīti ca tadvidaḥ /
GV05agsas_2u:200: guṇā iti guṇavidas tattvānīti ca tadvidaḥ // MandUpK_2.20 //
GV05agsas_2u:201: pādā iti pādavido viṣayā iti ca tadvidaḥ /
GV05agsas_2u:202: lokā iti lokavido devā iti ca tadvidaḥ // MandUpK_2.21 //
GV05agsas_2u:203: vedā iti vedavido yajñā iti ca tadvidaḥ /
GV05agsas_2u:204: bhokteti ca bhoktṛvido bhojyam iti ca tadvidaḥ // MandUpK_2. 22 //
GV05agsas_2u:205: sūkṣma iti sūkṣmavidaḥ sthūla iti ca tadvidaḥ /
GV05agsas_2u:206: mūrta iti mūrtavido 'mūrta iti ca tadvidaḥ // MandUpK_2.23 //
GV05agsas_2u:207: kāla iti kālavido diśa iti ca tadvidaḥ /
GV05agsas_2u:208: vādā iti vādavido bhuvanānīti tadvidaḥ // MandUpK_2.24 //
GV05agsas_2u:209: mana iti manovido buddhir iti ca tadvidaḥ /
GV05agsas_2u:210: cittam iti cittavido dharmādharmau ca tadvidaḥ // MandUpK_2.25 //
GV05agsas_2u:211: pañcaviṃśaka ity eke ṣaḍviśa iti cāpare /
GV05agsas_2u:212: ekatriṃśaka ity āhur ananta iti cāpare // MandUpK_2.26 //
GV05agsas_2u:213: lokāṃl lokavidaḥ prāhur āśramā iti tadvidaḥ /
GV05agsas_2u:215: sṛṣṭir iti sṛṣṭivido laya iti ca tadvidaḥ /
GV05agsas_2u:216: sthitir iti sthitividaḥ sarve ceha tu sarvadā // MandUpK_2.28 //
GV05agsas_2u:217: prāṇaḥ prājño bījātmā tatkāryabhedā hītare sthatyantāḥ /
GV05agsas_2u:218: anye ca sarve laukikāḥ sarvaprāṇiparikalpitā bhedā rajjvāmiva sarpādayas tacchūnya ātmanyātmasvarūpāniścayahetoravidyayā kalpitā iti piṇḍīkṛtor'thaḥ
GV05agsas_2u:219: prāṇādiślokānāṃ pratyekaṃ padārthavyākhyāne phalguprayojanatvātsiddhapadārthatvācca yatno na kṛtaḥ //28//
GV05agsas_2u:222: yaṃ bhāvaṃ darśayed yasya taṃ bhāvaṃ sa tu paśyati /
GV05agsas_2u:223: taṃ cāvati sa bhūtvāsau tadgrahaḥ samupaiti tam // MandUpK_2.29 //
GV05agsas_2u:224: prāṇādīnāmanyatamamuktamanuktaṃ vānyaṃ bhāvaṃ padārthaṃ darśayedyasyācāryo 'nyo vāpta idameva tattvamiti sa taṃ bhāvamātmabhūtaṃ paśyatyayamahamiti vā mameti vā /
GV05agsas_2u:225: taṃ ca draṣṭāraṃ sa bhāvo 'vati yo darśito bhāvo 'sau bhūtvā rakṣati /
GV05agsas_2u:233: evaṃ yo veda tattvena kalpayet so 'viśaṅkitaḥ // MandUpK_2.30 //
GV05agsas_2u:234: etaiḥ prāṇādibhirātmano 'pṛthagbhūtairapṛthagbhāvaireṣa ātmā rajjuriva sarpādi vikalapnārūpaiḥ pṛthageveti lakṣito 'bhilakṣito niścito mūḍhairityarthaḥ
GV05agsas_2u:235: vivekināṃ tu rajjvāmiva kalpitāḥ sarpādayo nātmavyatirekeṇa prāṇādayaḥ santītyabhiprāya idaṃ sarvaṃ yadayamātmā (bṛ.u.2.4.6, 4.5.7) iti śruteḥ
GV05agsas_2u:236: evamātmavyatirekeṇāsatvaṃ rajjusarpavadātmani kalpitānāmātmānaṃ ca kevalaṃ nirvikalpaṃ
GV05agsas_2u:237: yo veda tattvena śrutito yuktitaśca sa aviśaṅkito vedārthaṃ vibhāgataḥ kalpayetkalpayatītyarthaḥ
GV05agsas_2u:245: tathā viśvam idaṃ dṛṣṭaṃ vedānteṣu vicakṣaṇaiḥ // MandUpK_2.31 //
GV05agsas_2u:246: svapnaśca māyā ca svapnamāye 'sadvastvātmike 'satyau sadvastvātmika iva lakṣyete 'vivekibhiḥ /
GV05agsas_2u:247: yathā ca prasāritapaṇyā paṇagṛhaprāsādastrīpuñjanapadavyavahārākīrṇamiva gandharvanagaraṃ dṛśyamānameva sadakasmādabhāvatāṃ gataṃ dṛṣṭam,
GV05agsas_2u:264: yadā vitathaṃ dvaitamātmaivaikaḥ paramārthataḥ saṃstadedaṃ niṣpannaṃ bhavati sarvo 'yaṃ laukiko vaidikaśca vyavahāro 'vidyāviṣaya eveti / tadā
GV05agsas_2u:265: na nirodho na cotpattir na baddho na ca sādhakaḥ /
GV05agsas_2u:266: na mumukṣur na vai mukta ity eṣā paramārthatā // MandUpK_2.32 //
GV05agsas_2u:284: sato hyutpattiḥ pralayo vā syānnāsataḥ śaśaviṣāṇāde /
GV05agsas_2u:287: yastu punardvaitasaṃvyavahāraḥ sa rajjusarpavadātmani prāṇādilakṣaṇaḥ kalpita ityuktam /
GV05agsas_2u:288: na hi manovikalpanāyā rajjusarpādilakṣaṇāyā rajjvāṃ pralaya utpattirvā /
GV05agsas_2u:289: na ca manasi rajjusarpasyotpattiḥ pralayo vā na cobhayato vā /
GV05agsas_2u:291: na hi niyate manasi suṣupte vā dvaitaṃ gṛhyate /
GV05agsas_2u:297: na; rajjusarpādivikalpanāyā nirāspadatvānupapattiriti pratyuktametatkathamujjīvayasītyāha rajjurapi sarpavikalpasyāspada bhūtā vikalpitaiveti dṛṣṭāntānupapattiḥ /
GV05agsas_2u:305: katham? sukhyahaṃ duḥkhī mūḍho jāto mṛto jīrṇo dehavān paśyāmi vyakto 'vyaktaḥ kartā phalī saṃyukto viyuktaḥ kṣīṇo vṛddhohaṃ mamaita ityevamādayaḥ sarva ātmanyadhyāropyante /
GV05agsas_2u:308: yadā caivaṃ viśeṣyasvarūpapratyayasya siddhatvānna kartavyatvaṃ śāstreṇa /
GV05agsas_2u:311: ca śreya iti sukhitvādinivartakaṃ śāstram ātmanyasukhitvādipratyayakaraṇena neti
GV05agsas_2u:321: bhāvair asadbhir evāyam advayena ca kalpitaḥ /
GV05agsas_2u:322: bhāvā apy advayenaiva tasmād advayatā śivā // MandUpK_2.33 //
GV05agsas_2u:323: yathā rajjvāmasadbhiḥ sapradhārādibhiradvayena ca rajjudravyeṇa satāyaṃ sarpa iyaṃ dhārā daṇḍo 'yamiti vā rajjudravyameva kalpyata evaṃ prāṇādibhiranantairasadbhirevāvidyamānaiḥ,
GV05agsas_2u:324: na paramārthataḥ na hyapracalite manasi kaścidbhāva upalakṣayituṃ śakyate kenacit;
GV05agsas_2u:326: pracalitasyaivopalabhyamānā bhāvā na paramārthataḥ santaḥ kalpayituṃ śakyāḥ ato 'sadbhireva
GV05agsas_2u:330: te ca prāṇādibhāvāṃ apyadvayenaiva satātmanā vikalpitāḥ /
GV05agsas_2u:341: na pṛthaṅ nāpṛthak kiñcid iti tattvavido viduḥ // MandUpK_2.34 //
GV05agsas_2u:342: na hyatrādvaye paramārthasatyātmani prāṇādisaṃsārajātamidaṃ jagadātmabhāvena paramārthasvarūpeṇa nirīpyamāṇaṃ nānā vastvantarabhūtaṃ bhavati
GV05agsas_2u:343: yathā rajjusvarūpeṇa prakāśena nirūpyamāṇo na nānābhūtaḥ kalpitaḥ sarpo 'sti tadvat /
GV05agsas_2u:346: tathānyonyaṃ na pṛthakprāṇādi vastu yathāśvānmahiṣaḥ pṛthagvidyata evam /
GV05agsas_2u:347: ato 'stvānnāpṛthagvidyate 'nyonyaṃ pareṇa vā kiñcidity evaṃ paramārthatattvamātavido brāhmaṇā viduḥ /
GV05agsas_2u:352: nirvikalpo hy ayaṃ dṛṣṭaḥ prapañcopaśamo 'dvayaḥ // MandUpK_2.35 //
GV05agsas_2u:354: rvikalpaḥ sarvavikalpaḥ śūnyo 'mātmā dṛṣṭa upalabdho vedāntārthatatparaiḥ prapañcopaśamaḥ
GV05agsas_2u:355: prapañco dvaitabhedavistārastasyopaśamo 'bhāvo yasminsa ātmā prapañcopaśamo 'ta evādvayo
GV05agsas_2u:356: vigatadoṣaireva paṇḍitairvedāntārthatatparaiḥ saṃnyasibhiḥ paramātmā draṣṭuṃ śakyaḥ,
GV05agsas_2u:360: tasmād evaṃ viditvainam advaite yojayet smṛtim /
GV05agsas_2u:364: taccādvaitamavagamyāhamasmi paraṃ brahmeti viditvāśanāyādyatītaṃ sākṣādaparokṣādajamātmānaṃ sarvalokavyavahārātītaṃ jaḍavallokamācaret /
GV05agsas_2u:369: calācalaniketaś ca yatir yādṛcchiko bhavet // MandUpK_2.37 //
GV05agsas_2u:376: vismṛtyāhamiti manyate yadā tadā calo deho niketo yasya sa ayamevaṃ calācalaniketo
GV05agsas_2u:380: tattvam ādhyātmikaṃ dṛṣṭvā tattvaṃ dṛṣṭvā tu bāhyataḥ /
GV05agsas_2u:381: tattvībhūtas tadārāmas tattvād apracyuto bhavet // MandUpK_2.38 //
GV05agsas_2u:382: bāhyaṃ pṛthivyāditatvaṃ ādhyātmikaṃ ca dehādilakṣaṇaṃ rajjusarpādivatsvapnamāyādivacca asat“vācārambhaṇaṃ vikāro nāmadheyam” (chā.u.6 / 1 /
GV05agsas_2u:384: ātmā ca sabāhyābhyantaro hyajo 'pūrvo 'nantaro 'bāhyaḥ kṛtsna ākāśavatsarvagataḥ sūkṣmo 'calo nirguṇo niṣkalo niṣkriyaḥ“tatsatyaṃ sa ātmā tattvamasi“(chā.u.6 / 8 / 16) iti śruteḥ /
GV05agsas_2u:385: ityevaṃ tattvaṃ dṛṣṭvā tattvībhūtastadārāmo na bāhyaramaṇo yathātattvadarśī kaściccittamātmatvena
GV05agsas_2u:388: samāhite cu manasi kadācittattvabhūtaṃ prasannātmānaṃ manyata idānīmasmi tattvībhūta iti;
GV05agsas_2u:391: sadaiva brahmāsmītyapracyuto bhavettattvātsadāpracyutātmatattvadarśano bhavedityabhiprāyaḥ“śuni caiva śvapāke ca paṇḍitāḥ samadarśinaḥ“(gītā
